function_call.name: classify_risks
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Airports identified as efficient but expensive for controlling infection spread","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Effectiveness of npis dependent on urban planning and design","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Variable success of npis in different cities and countries","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Medium-low"},{"name":"Transmission of infectious diseases in urban settings due to population density","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inequities faced by different social groups in urban settings","category":"Social risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Lack of clear relationship between population density and infectious disease transmission","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Connectivity between districts impacting mortality during influenza pandemic","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Effect of density and npis on infection rates","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Impact of socioeconomic factors on pandemic spread","category":"Social risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Spatial disparities in transport infrastructure correlated with h1n1 outbreak impacts","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"High density residential areas linked to covid-19 outbreak","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Transmission of covid-19 due to air pollution-to-human transmission","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Lack of urban system preparedness for respiratory pandemics","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate collaboration across sectors and disciplines","category":"Behavioral risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Poor integration of pandemic guidance into urban planning","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Intercity and intracity transport systems, airports, ports, and hubs pose essential threats to urban areas and make them vulnerable to pandemics.","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Close similarities observed between historical guidance and 2007 guidance in pandemic preparedness planning.","category":"Behavioral risks","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Significant and positive association between the frequency of flights, trains, and buses from specific regions and the spread of contagious diseases.","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Population reflux in labor-intensive cities leading to future outbreaks","category":"Social risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Use of bioaerosol samplers in crowded public spaces to monitor respiratory viruses","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Vulnerable populations at risk due to respiratory pandemics","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of future-oriented urban planning and design post-covid-19","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Global interconnectivity of cities leading to the spread of respiratory pandemics","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of urban design responses and mitigation strategies for respiratory pandemics","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Medium-low"},{"name":"Inadequate engagement of diverse communities in pandemic planning","category":"Behavioral risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Inadequate coverage of equity issues in the literature review","category":"Social risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Insufficient research on the role of infrastructure in pandemics","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Limited scope for developing robust findings from recent experiences with covid-19","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Insufficient planning and design of infrastructure for halting the spread of pandemics","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Medium-low"},{"name":"Neglect of economic potential of infrastructure in preparing or responding to pandemics","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Overlooked relationship between infrastructure, agglomeration, and pandemics","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Inadequate identification of interventions due to rapid review process.","category":"Behavioral risks","confidence":"Medium-low"},{"name":"Incomplete integration of lessons from historical pandemics prior to 1900.","category":"Behavioral risks","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Rapidly evolving knowledge in the field of pandemic planning and urban connections.","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Lack of effective screening criteria leads to the inclusion of irrelevant articles","category":"Behavioral risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Exclusion of relevant articles based on abstract and title screening","category":"Behavioral risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Exclusion of relevant articles during data extraction","category":"Behavioral risks","confidence":"Medium-low"},{"name":"Impact of temperature and in-sewer travel time on virus detectability","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Global monitoring of 2.1 billion people in sewage treatment plants","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Uncertainty in the information gleaned from monitoring for SARS-CoV-2 RNA in wastewater","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Potential bias in wastewater temperature as a source of data bias in wastewater-based epidemiology","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Estimation of initial SARS-CoV-2 loads and persistence in wastewater","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Transmission of contagious diseases through wastewater collection system","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"High"}]}
